original_title: Cracking The Egg: The Untold Story of The Nightcrawlers
overview: Kelly Rouse's award-winning documentary about the legendary Daytona Beach garage band, the Nightcrawlers, who had a regional and national hit with the folk rock nugget "The Little Black Egg." True tales of mid-'60s rock n' roll, featuring interviews with original members Chuck Conlon, Sylvan Wells, Robbie Rouse, Pete Thomason, and Tommy Ruger.
title: Cracking The Egg: The Untold Story of The Nightcrawlers
